channel.title: SDN on Engineering Field Notes
channel.description: Recent content in SDN on Engineering Field Notes

item.title: Controller discussion is excessive, we need more about other aspects
item.description: Ever since SDN has been revealed and considered as the future in the industry by the public. There are abundant discussions about OpenFlow, ACI, NSX, etc. The main focus right now is the software part including southern API, northern API and more. The discussion about those new features which SDN could bring us has instigated the aspires of this Old-thought-with-new-implementation for network fellows who have been suffered for a long time for the poor management & controllability of network entities.

item.title: SDN时代硬件依然重要
item.description: 不管从什么地方看到SDN的文章，都是集中于本身的实现与将来的美好愿景，似乎传统的硬件厂商在这一次的技术革新中都难逃厄运。但是我的观点是：SD

item.title: Huawei has published SDN product
item.description: I’ve walked through the news from official website about SDN, which I thought was a missing part of their product line, and found a interesting one. Seems Huawei finally caught up with the SDN bus. I personally don’t think what has been mentioned in the news will bring truly impact to the SDN market, and prefer to take it as only a symbol for Huawei entering the SDN game. Here are some of my reasons:
